attr.title: Xenosensory
attr.desc: Xenosensory is a short incremental casual game with horror themes. Use your cursor to bust Xenos and save convicts, then spend your research points on skill tree upgrades, actions, gadgets, and uncover the true horrifying nature of this space station nightmare.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. Devices with RK3326 cpu are not recommended for performance reasons.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/4037830/Xenosensory/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. Devices with `RK3326` cpu are `not recommended` for performance reasons.
